  • Packages that use AbstractMessagingShard 
    Package Description
    example.webSocketsDeployment
    Verifies: correct functioning of the websockets support infrastructure, in three different loading contexts (manual deployment, with deployment configuration and simple agents, and with deployment configuration and composite agents).
    net.xqhs.flash.core.support
    Core classes dealing with support items, such as communication and mobility.
    net.xqhs.flash.local
    Package that offers support for local communication.

      Subclasses of AbstractMessagingShard in net.xqhs.flash.core.support 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractNameBasedMessagingShard
      A simple extension of AbstractMessagingShard, which leaves to implement only sendMessage(String, String, String) as an abstract method, and also the registration of a message receiver to the pylon.

    • Uses of AbstractMessagingShard in net.xqhs.flash.local

      Subclasses of AbstractMessagingShard in net.xqhs.flash.local 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  LocalPylon.SimpleLocalMessaging
      Simple implementation of AbstractMessagingShard, that uses agents' names as their addresses.

      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  WebSocketMessagingShard
      The WebSocketMessagingShard class manages the link between agent's messaging service and its pylon.
